source: ### Create ECDS_Accomodation_Type table

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("IdOrder", IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("AccomodationTypeDesc", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("AccomodationDateAdded", TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("AccomodationTypeSNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("AmendOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add the InsertedOn column with the current timestamp as default
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_Accomodation_Type"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

print("Delta table ECDS_Accomodation_Type created successfully.")

### Create ECDS_CodedClinicalFindings table

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("ObsId", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("obsdetailsid", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("Coded_FindingSNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Coded_FindingDesc", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Coded_Finding_Timestamp", TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("AmendOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add the InsertedOn column with the current timestamp as default
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_CodedClinicalFindings"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

# Note: Primary Key is (visitarchiveid, ObsId, obsdetailsid)
# Delta Lake doesn't support primary key constraints directly, but we can ensure data integrity in our write operations

print("Delta table ECDS_CodedClinicalFindings created successfully.")

])

# Note: The original table had a non-clustered index on (visitarchiveid, Coded_Assessment_Tool_TypeDesc)
# Delta Lake handles indexing differently. Consider using these fields for partitioning or Z-ordering if needed.

### Create ECDS_Diagnosis table

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType

# Define the schema for the table

    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False),

    StructField("EC_Diagnosis_CodeSNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Coded_Clinical_Entry_Seq_Num", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("EC_Diagnosis_QualifierSNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("DiagnosisQualifierDesc", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("EC_Diagnosis_LataralitySNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("DiagnosisLataralityDesc", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("DiagnosisComment", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("AmendOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema

df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

# Note: The original table had a non-clustered index on (visitarchiveid)
# Delta Lake handles indexing differently. Consider using this field for partitioning or Z-ordering if needed.

print("Delta table ECDS_Diagnosis created successfully.")
### Create ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab table

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType

# Define the schema for the table
schema_fields = [
    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False)
]

# Dynamically create fields for diagnoses 1-10
for i in range(1, 11):
    schema_fields.extend([
        StructField(f"Diagnosiosis{i}Desc", StringType(), nullable=True),
        StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Code{i}SNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
        StructField(f"DiagnosisQualifier{i}Desc", StringType(), nullable=True),
        StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Qualifier{i}SNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
        StructField(f"DiagnosisLatarality{i}Desc", StringType(), nullable=True),
        StructField(f"EC_Diagnosis_Latarality{i}SNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True)
    ])

# Add InsertedOn field
schema_fields.append(StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True))

# Create the schema
schema = StructType(schema_fields)

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add the InsertedOn column with the current timestamp as default
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

print("Delta table ECDS_Diagnosis_xTab created successfully.")

### Create ECDS_StoredProc_Log table

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, expr
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType, LongType

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("LogID", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("StepDescription", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("StepStart", TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("StepFinish", TimestampType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("StepDurationSecs", LongType(), nullable=True)
])

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add the computed column StepDurationSecs
df = df.withColumn("StepDurationSecs", 
                   expr("cast(unix_timestamp(StepFinish) - unix_timestamp(StepStart) as long)"))

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_StoredProc_Log"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

print("Delta table ECDS_StoredProc_Log created successfully.")

### Create table ECDStoCDS_MappingGroup

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("MappingCodeType", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("MappingCodeDescription", StringType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=False)

schema = StructType([

    StructField("Ethnic_Cat_2021", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Accomm_Status", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Pref_Spoken_Lang", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Accessible_Inf_Pro_Required", StringType(), nullable=True),

    StructField("EC_ATT_Source_DESC", StringType(), nullable=True),

    StructField("Org_Code_Comm", StringType(), nullable=True),

    StructField("EC_Discharge_Status_DESC", StringType(), nullable=True),

    StructField("EC_Departure_Date_Time", TimestampType(), nullable=True),

    StructField("EC_Discharge_Follow_Up_SNOMED", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("EC_Discharge_Follow_Up_DESC", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("EC_Discharge_Info_Given", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Clinical_Trial_Identifier", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Disease_Outbreak_Notification", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Disease_Outbreak_Notification_Desc", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("EpisodeID", IntegerType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("Sensitive_Flag", StringType(), nullable=True),
    StructField("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("AmendedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=True)
])

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add default values
df = df.withColumn("Sensitive_Flag", lit("N"))
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_EmergencyVisitData_Main"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

# Create a Delta table object
delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, delta_table_path)

# Set the table properties to enforce constraints
delta_table.update_metadata({
    "delta.constraints.visitarchiveid.type": "NOT_NULL,PRIMARY_KEY"
})

# Create a non-clustered index
spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IX_ArrivalDateTime
    ON delta.`{delta_table_path}` (Arrival_Date_Time)
    USING BLOOM
    OPTIONS ('bloomFilterSize' = '262144', 'numTasksForIndexing' = '2')
""")

print("Delta table ECDS_EmergencyVisitData_Main created successfully with PRIMARY KEY constraint and index.")
### Create table ECDS_Investigations_xTab

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False)
])

# Add fields for each of the 30 investigation codes
for i in range(1, 31):
    schema.add(f"EC_InvestigationCode{i}SNOMED", StringType(), True)
    schema.add(f"EC_InvestigationCode{i}CDS", StringType(), True)
    schema.add(f"EC_InvestigationCode{i}Date", TimestampType(), True)
    schema.add(f"EC_InvestigationCode{i}Desc", StringType(), True)

# Add InsertedOn field
schema.add("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), True)

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add the InsertedOn column with the current timestamp as default
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDS_Investigations_xTab"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

# Create a Delta table object
delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, delta_table_path)

# Set the table properties to enforce constraints
delta_table.update_metadata({
    "delta.constraints.visitarchiveid.type": "NOT_NULL,PRIMARY_KEY"
})

print("Delta table ECDS_Investigations_xTab created successfully with PRIMARY KEY constraint.")
### Create table ECDSGrouperInput

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, TimestampType
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define the schema for the table
schema = StructType([
    StructField("visitarchiveid", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("Er_Visit_ID", IntegerType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("PatID", StringType(), True),
    StructField("Site_Code_Of_Treatment", StringType(), True),
    StructField("Arrival_Date_Time", TimestampType(), nullable=False),
    StructField("EC_Attendance_Conclusion_Date_Time", TimestampType(), True),
    StructField("EmergencyCareDepartmentType", StringType(), True),
    StructField("PatientAge", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("PatientGroup", StringType(), True)
])

# Add fields for each of the 30 investigation codes
for i in range(1, 31):
    schema.add(f"EC_InvestigationCode{i}CDS", StringType(), True)

# Add fields for each of the 30 procedure codes
for i in range(1, 31):
    schema.add(f"ProcCode{i}CDS", StringType(), True)

# Add remaining fields
schema.add("Streamed_Flag", StringType(), True)
schema.add("Sensitive_Flag", StringType(), True)
schema.add("InsertedOn", TimestampType(), nullable=False)

# Create an empty DataFrame with the defined schema
df = spark.createDataFrame([], schema)

# Add default values
df = df.withColumn("EmergencyCareDepartmentType", lit("1"))
df = df.withColumn("Sensitive_Flag", lit("N"))
df = df.withColumn("InsertedOn", current_timestamp())

# Define the path for the Delta table
delta_table_path = "abfss://Curated@dlsrxcdevuksdp01.dfs.core.windows.net/ESHT/ECDS/ECDSGrouperInput"

# Write the DataFrame as a Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(delta_table_path)

# Create a Delta table object
delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, delta_table_path)

# Set the table properties to enforce constraints
delta_table.update_metadata({
    "delta.constraints.visitarchiveid.type": "NOT_NULL,PRIMARY_KEY"
})

print("Delta table ECDSGrouperInput created successfully with PRIMARY KEY constraint and default values.")
